rules
Class Piece

java.lang.Object
  rules.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Board
public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object

Piece object. I made it such that it implements the position object as well. This is done by two integers which define the location of the piece.

          The identifier for bishops

          The colour/side identifier for black pieces

          The type of the piece, read the public elements for the corresponding ID's

          The identifier for rooks

          The state of the piece, whether the piece is alive or not

Constructor Detail

Piece

public Piece()
Makes a new piece with no position, set on side = 0, ptype = 0 and state as false;

Piece

public Piece(int xpos,
             int ypos,
             int ptype,
             int side)
Makes a piece with the given position, type (and state = true)

Parameters:
xpos - the x position of the piece
ypos - the y position of the piece
ptype - the type of the piece (pawn, knight, etc..)
side - the colour of the piece
